summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Ten Thousand One Hundred Ninety-four and Thirty-four One-hundredths ($10,194.34) Dollars, from the Lighting Fund to pay the city's assessment of Local Improvement District No. 1446, creating Local Improvement District No. 15610; and directing the issuance of a warrant in said sum in favor of said Local Improvement District No. 1446.
